price: Kuma idan kuka sake su daga gabãnin ku shãfe su, alhãli kuwa* kun yanka musu sadãki, to, rabin abin da kuka yanka fãce idan sun yãfe, kõ wanda ɗaurin auren yake ga hannunsa ya yãfe. Kuma ku yãfe ɗin ne mafi kusa da taƙawa. Kuma kada ku manta da falala a tsakãninku. Lalle ne Allah ga abin da kuke aikatãwa Mai gani ne.
arabic: وَإِن طَلَّقۡتُمُوهُنَّ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَمَسُّوهُنَّ وَقَدۡ فَرَضۡتُمۡ لَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةٗ فَنِصۡفُ مَا فَرَضۡتُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يَعۡفُونَ أَوۡ يَعۡفُوَاْ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِۦ عُقۡدَةُ ٱلنِّكَاحِۚ وَأَن تَعۡفُوٓاْ أَقۡرَبُ لِلتَّقۡوَىٰۚ وَلَا تَنسَوُاْ ٱلۡفَضۡلَ بَيۡنَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
footnotes: * Bayãnin sadãkin wadda aka yanka wa sadãki amma kuma aka sake ta gabãnin shãfa, to, ita tanã da rabin sadãkinta, sai idan tã zauna a ɗakinsa shekara guda cikakkiya, to, sai a biya ta dukan sadãkinta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in ṭallaqtumūhunna min qabli an tamassūhunna waqad faraḍtum lahunna farīḍatan faniṣ'fu mā faraḍtum illā an yaʿfūna aw yaʿfuwā alladhī biyadihi ʿuq'datu al-nikāḥi wa-an taʿfū aqrabu lilttaqwā walā tansawū al-faḍla baynakum inna al-laha bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
